Reviews.Title: Does not work with Verizon
Reviews.Author: Michele Geye
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my son's Verizon contract, does not work with their service. Misleading sale, CDM phone needed for Verizon

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Network: GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
Display Type TFT, 262K colors Size 220 x 176 pixels, 2.00 inches
Battery Standard battery, Li-Ion 850 mAh Stand-by Up to 168 h Talk time Up to 3 h
ProductInfo.Name: Blu Q-130-OR Deco Mini Unlocked Dual-Sim Phone with 1.3 MP Camera, QWERTY Keyboard, MP3 Player and FM Radio - No Warranty -Orange
